properties.description: Loading into temp table. Procedure runs to do the anlytical functions into the target table dwh_prepare.pre_fact_ibnr

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		pk_ibnr as long,
		capital_branch as string,
		gross_net as string,
		accounting_period as date,
		hydra_ind as string,
		ibnr_usd as long,
		updated_date as date,
		text as string,
		mutual_fixed as string,
		financial_year as long,
		binary_events as long,
		equalisation_reserve_usd as long,
		source_system as string,
		incident_year as long,
		ulae_usd as long,
		business_area as string,
		capital as string,
		inserted_date as date,
		poolable_ind as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from dwh_stage.sta_ibnr',
	format: 'query') ~> StaIBNR
source(output(
		source_code_key as string,
		target_code as string,
		target_description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select source_code_key, target_code, target_description from dwh_stage.t_crossreference where source_system=\'PARIS\' and code_type_id=464',
	format: 'query') ~> xrefCapitalBranch
renaming derive(dim_time_incident_year = case(isNull(trim(toString(incident_year)))==true(),'-1',toString(incident_year)),
		dim_time_financial_year = case(isNull(trim(toString(financial_year)))==true(),'N/A',toString(financial_year)),
		dim_business_area = case(in(['EN', 'BU', 'PM', 'CO', 'MA', 'PF'],business_area)==false(), 'N/A',business_area)) ~> DimTimeKeys
DimTimeKeys, xrefCapitalBranch lookup(capital_branch == target_code,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CapitalBranch
droppingcolumns sort(asc(dim_capital_branch, false),
	asc(dim_business_area, false),
	asc(dim_time_incident_year, false),
	asc(gross_net, false),
	asc(poolable_ind, false),
	asc(hydra_ind, false),
	asc(dim_time_financial_year, false)) ~> Sorter
CapitalBranch derive(each(match(endsWith(name,'_usd')), 'gross_'+$$ = coalesce(case(gross_net=='G', $$, toLong(0)),0)),
		each(match(endsWith(name,'_usd')), 'net_'+$$ = coalesce(case(gross_net=='N', $$, toLong(0)),0))) ~> Values
StaIBNR select(mapColumn(
		pk_ibnr,
		capital_branch,
		gross_net,
		accounting_period,
		hydra_ind,
		ibnr_usd,
		updated_date,
		text,
		mutual_fixed,
		financial_year,
		binary_events_usd = binary_events,
		equalisation_reserve_usd,
		source_system,
		incident_year,
		ulae_usd,
		business_area,
		capital,
		inserted_date,
		poolable_ind,
		source_system
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renaming
Values select(mapColumn(
		pk_transaction_key = pk_ibnr,
		gross_net,
		hydra_ind,
		text,
		inserted_date,
		poolable_ind,
		dim_time_incident_year,
		dim_time_financial_year,
		dim_business_area,
		dim_capital_branch = target_code,
		gross_ibnr_usd,
		gross_binary_events_usd,
		gross_equalisation_reserve_usd,
		gross_ulae_usd,
		net_ibnr_usd,
		net_binary_events_usd,
		net_equalisation_reserve_usd,
		net_ulae_usd,
		dim_trans_date = accounting_period,
		source_system
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> droppingcolumns
Sorter window(over(dim_capital_branch,
		dim_business_area,
		dim_time_incident_year,
		gross_net,
		poolable_ind,
		hydra_ind),
	asc(dim_capital_branch, true),
	asc(dim_business_area, true),
	asc(dim_time_incident_year, true),
	asc(gross_net, true),
	asc(poolable_ind, true),
	asc(hydra_ind, true),
	asc(dim_trans_date, true),
	each(match(type=='long'&&(startsWith(name, 'gross_')||startsWith(name, '_net'))), $$ = $$-lag($$, 1, 0))) ~> analyticfunc
analyticfunc sink(input(
		pk_transaction_key as long,
		net_binary_events_usd as decimal(28,10),
		dim_capital as string,
		dim_capital_branch as string,
		dim_business_area as string,
		net_ibnr_usd as decimal(28,10),
		dim_time_trans_date as date,
		net_ulae_usd as decimal(28,10),
		net_equalisation_reserve_usd as decimal(28,10),
		dim_time_incident_year as string,
		dim_time_financial_year as string,
		poolable_ind as string,
		hydra_ind as string,
		gross_equalisation_reserve_usd as decimal(28,10),
		gross_ibnr_usd as decimal(28,10),
		gross_ulae_usd as decimal(28,10),
		dim_risk_object as string,
		dim_agreement_type as string,
		gross_binary_events_usd as decimal(28,10),
		text as string,
		source_system as string,
		date_inserted as timestamp,
		last_updated_by as string,
		inserted_by as string,
		date_last_updated as timestamp,
		gross_net as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		pk_transaction_key,
		net_binary_events_usd,
		dim_capital_branch,
		dim_business_area,
		net_ibnr_usd,
		dim_time_trans_date = dim_trans_date,
		net_ulae_usd,
		net_equalisation_reserve_usd,
		dim_time_incident_year,
		dim_time_financial_year,
		poolable_ind,
		hydra_ind,
		gross_equalisation_reserve_usd,
		gross_ibnr_usd,
		gross_ulae_usd,
		gross_binary_events_usd,
		text,
		source_system,
		gross_net
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> tmpPreFactIbnr
